before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ttdk","text":"- Wash all the area and Becher 1L with EtOH 70% and RNase away.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgi3j","text":"- Put 2 glove pairs to be more protected from the cold.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpjr0","text":"- Put each material (tweezers, cisors, spoon, Falcon 50, FreezerMill equipment, teethbrush) at least 20min under UV light before and between each cryogrinding.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5bf3e","text":"Cell Lysis can be difficult to conduct for envirronmental water samples collected on big filters, specially when big water volumes (20-100L) have been filtered on polycarbanate 142mm-diameter filters.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4td6a","text":"Here we developped a mecanic lyis protocol in liquid nitrogen conditions to get preserved DNA and RNA.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drkob","text":"This protocol was developped for combined RNA and DNA extraction from environmental water samples for Biomarks (2009-2013) and TARA OCEANS projects (2009-ongoing).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Ecology of Marine Plankton (ECOMAP) team - Roscoff

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8knb2","text":"Liquid nitrogen should be handled in well-ventilated areas.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51iq5","text":"Wear a labcoat, nitrile gloves and googles.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8guff","text":"Put 2 glove pairs to be more protected from the cold.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cg0c","text":"Wear cold-specific gloves when you work in contact with liquid nitrogen.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7e6m1","text":"To not degrade RNA, all work must be done with liquid nitrogen.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"811f8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Alberti A., Poulain J., Engelen S., Labadie K., Sarah Romac S., [...], Wincker P. Viral to metazoan marine plankton nucleotide sequences from the TaraOceans expedition. Scientific Data (2017). dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.qv6dw9e
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"en49i","text":"- FreezerMill 6770 (Spex) with grinding equipment;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qklt","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2bti8","text":"- Becher 1L","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ukqj","text":"- 2 tweezers;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4phql","text":"- Cisor pair;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ii3r","text":"- Spoon or spatula; ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5170g","text":"- Falcon50 and rack;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fk79","text":"- Teethbrush;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2icjl","text":"- Crab tweezer;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de8l5","text":"- Liquid Nitrogen;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a377h","text":"- Decontaminants : 1% diluted bleach , milliQ water, RNase away and Ethanol 70%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"7EF1F51D78AB11EAA6300242AC110002","id":59995,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"0620-103306-FM_Brochure_2018_v4-1.pdf","placeholder":"/img/extensions/pdf.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/private/8c9e40484e48754aeac93f50563d4769f22f87350b9fa05483d7f6f2ae081794/b4u59ufn.pdf"}}}}

parent_protocols.title: RNA/DNA extraction from natural samples using NucleoSpin RNAII + RNA/DNA Buffer kits (Macherey Nagel)
RNA/DNA extraction from natural samples using NucleoSpin RNAL + RNA/DNA Buffer kits (Macherey Nagel)

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6qj9v","text":"Finish the assembly of the cryogrinding tube : insert the magnet inside the tube and close the tube with the other extremity containing the hole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eibv6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bk0d","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evp4e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A5777D30538511ECAED2653CF54CD886","height":187,"id":208746,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3qh9ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5k9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5j9ufn.webp","width":90}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cclfc","text":"Put the tube in the FreezerMill chamber, and check the liquid nitrogen level and close the FreezerMill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uar","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jgg7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D4B61020538511ECAED2653CF54CD886","height":248,"id":208748,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3qj9ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5n9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5m9ufn.webp","width":199}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46h5h","text":"Set up the FreezerMill cryogrinding conditions : ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43rmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3n8u","text":"Precool:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"esr0","text":"Run time:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pj14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"221gs","text":"Cycles number: 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eufbg","text":"Rate: 5 knocks per sec. (respect roughly this condition!).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90vuh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd1b5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"501FD44078AD11EA82B2F7967581B3C5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"5ED11EE078AD11EA82B2F7967581B3C5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ks31","text":"Replace the Falcon50 in the liquid nitrogen in the Becher and process to the cryogrinding of the second part of the 142mm filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee47j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"921f3","text":"For that, take the Falcon50 containing the half-part left of the 142mm filter and repeat steps 9 to 18.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":81,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agnon","text":"Disassemble  the cryogrinding tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gs6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftot","text":"Wash thoroughly all the parts of the cryogrinding tubes, and the FreezerMill extractor  using a teethbrush to remove powder residues following this order :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9o3s0","text":"- 1% diluted bleach ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u4nr","text":"- tap water ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4r8u","text":"- milliQ water ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p8j","text":"- EtOH 70% .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mob0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h9jg","text":"Decontaminate the bench, and Becher using RNase away for next sample cryogrinding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80b6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bkq1","text":"Put all the small equipment cited above (including the teethbrush) on an alumin paper and incubate them into UV-light at least 20min. (in a PCR hood or a cross-linker for instance, https://www.dutscher.com/frontoffice/product?produitId=0O-78-39)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":181,"length":63}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C5E259C5541B11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.dutscher.com/frontoffice/product?produitId=0O-78-39"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0tgn","text":"Check the level using a 10mL pipette (maximum level of liquid ntrogen should correspond to 5 mL on pipette's graduation).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abofb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atte5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l282","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hcm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eiu3d","text":"Pour a half the 1 L Becher with liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63iqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qql9","text":"Dive the sample tube containing the 142mm filter in the Becher to keep it deep-frozeen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arelm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nhkt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mcdu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":92,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d0mmi","text":"Always check the volume of liquid nitrogen inside the Becher to avoid degradation of sample.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"945l","text":"Close delicately the lid of the FreezerMill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65lqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7em00","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mjh6","text":"Fill the Freezer Mill tank : pour Liquid Ntrogen in the tank until the \"up limit\" graduation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7esqd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brdrk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c90p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bkc63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":66,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"65d0n","text":"Always check the volume of liquid nitrogen inside the FreezerMill.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dj8e","text":"Wait for 20-30 min until the Freezer Mill reachs in temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k0jb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edjtv","text":"Assemble the bases for 2 FreezerMill cryogrinding tubes :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d8dq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5injm","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5r0p3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BF76AC104EB711ECB3541DA8A93B6224","height":175,"id":208750,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fz5v9ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5q9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5p9ufn.webp","width":108}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fepj","text":"Put the 2 half-assembled tubes in the Becher .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1vq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rcji","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dk0rj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F6F648804EB711ECB3541DA8A93B6224","height":176,"id":208752,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fz539ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5s9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5r9ufn.webp","width":192}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7el83","text":"Take the sample tube with the tweezers, open the tube and take the filter with the tweezers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65htj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s1i0","text":"If the filter resists, delicately break the tube using the crab tweezer keeping holding the tube with the tweezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ddil","text":"Take away the filter with the tweezer and cut the half of the filter using the cizors and put it in a Falcon50. Put this Falcon in the liquid Nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dht6s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u6oi","text":"Cut the other half-part filter again in twice and put these 2 pieces in one of the 2 frozen cryogrinding tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vhfm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1srv7","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36jtp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tveq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"704BBBD0538511ECAED2653CF54CD886","height":182,"id":208754,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3qf9ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5u9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5t9ufn.webp","width":188}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7jrt0","text":"Start the run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4les","text":"Put a sterile Falcon50 correctly annotated (Sample code) in the Becher containing liquid Nitrogen for cooling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46tob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnrjg","text":"This Falcon will be used to collect the final powder from the cryogrinded filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"245lh","text":"When the run is \"complete\", open delicately the FreezerMill and take the cryogrinding tube using the FreezerMill extractor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de2s0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkj8q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3m73b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"diq09","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b43d8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6D824E40541711EC995B19BD93990115","height":182,"id":208756,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f32b9ufn.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5w9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5v9ufn.webp","width":115}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":63,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"sd74","text":"Avoid to touch the cryoginding tube with the cryogenic gloves. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4n5se","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":35,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7oced","text":"Preferably use some Kimwipe papers.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ipms","text":"Put the cryogrinding tube in the Becher containing liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43hot","text":"Open delicately the cryogrinding tube using the FreezerMill extractor, and remove the magnet using tweezers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bmna","text":"Transfer the powder obtained in the Falcon50 tube by directly inversing the the cryogrinding tube inside the Falcon50. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ead5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b1kn","text":"Afterthat, use the spatula to collect a maximum of powder. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3r64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27sg4","text":"Recover most of material you can using the spatula.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ugta","text":"At the end of the 2 cryogrinding runs, store the Falcon50 tube containing the powder at -80°C until RNA/DNA extraction process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6mq5n","text":"Choose the format of the filter for next steps :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bp4af","text":"Pour a half the 1 L Becher with liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccu0r","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"boce6","text":"Dive the sample tube containing the 142mm filter in the Becher to keep it deep-frozeen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ofln","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9le0a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jg7u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l55s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3ra6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":92,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ckj9l","text":"Always check the volume of liquid nitrogen inside the Becher to avoid degradation of sample.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hipq","text":"Assemble the bases for 1 FreezerMill cryogrinding tube :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anjii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ojeb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6555DF10543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","height":175,"id":208758,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm529ufn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5y9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5z9ufn.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm5x9ufn.webp","width":108}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fepj","text":"Put the half-assembled tube in the Becher .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1vq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rcji","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dk0rj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"855C74D7543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","height":176,"id":208762,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm569ufn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm549ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm559ufn.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm539ufn.webp","width":192}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7el83","text":"Take the sample tube with the tweezers, open the tube and take the filter with the tweezers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"65htj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6s1i0","text":"If the filter resists, delicately break the tube using the crab tweezer keeping holding the tube with the tweezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ddil","text":"Take away the filter with the tweezer and put it in the frozen cryogrinding tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36jtp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tveq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qj9v","text":"Finish the assembly of the cryogrinding tube : insert the magnet inside the tube and close the tube with the other extremity containing the hole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eibv6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7bk0d","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"evp4e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"85928964543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","height":187,"id":208766,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6a9ufn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm589ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm599ufn.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm579ufn.webp","width":90}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cclfc","text":"Put the tube in the FreezerMill chamber, and check the liquid nitrogen level and close the FreezerMill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4uar","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7jgg7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"85C4D411543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","height":248,"id":208770,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6e9ufn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6c9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6d9ufn.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6b9ufn.webp","width":199}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4les","text":"Put a sterile Falcon50 correctly annotated (Sample code) in the Becher containing liquid Nitrogen for cooling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"46tob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bnrjg","text":"This Falcon will be used to collect the final powder from the cryogrinded filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46h5h","text":"Set up the FreezerMill cryogrinding conditions : ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"43rmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b3n8u","text":"Precool:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"esr0","text":"Run time:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1pj14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"221gs","text":"Cycles number: 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eufbg","text":"Rate: 5 knocks per sec. (respect roughly this condition!).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"90vuh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bd1b5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"EB8292AE543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"EB829367543E11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7jrt0","text":"Start the run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"245lh","text":"When the run is \"complete\", open delicately the FreezerMill and take the cryogrinding tube using the FreezerMill extractor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"de2s0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fkj8q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3m73b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"diq09","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b43d8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":63,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"sd74","text":"Avoid to touch the cryoginding tube with the cryogenic gloves. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4n5se","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":35,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7oced","text":"Preferably use some Kimwipe papers.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"1BCA3206543F11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","height":182,"id":208774,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6i9ufn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6g9ufn.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6h9ufn.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gm6f9ufn.webp","width":115}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":63,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"sd74","text":"Avoid to touch the cryoginding tube with the cryogenic gloves. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4n5se","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":35,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7oced","text":"Preferably use some Kimwipe papers.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ipms","text":"Put the cryogrinding tube in the Becher containing liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43hot","text":"Open delicately the cryogrinding tube using the FreezerMill extractor, and remove the magnet using tweezers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bmna","text":"Transfer the powder obtained in the Falcon50 tube by directly inversing the the cryogrinding tube inside the Falcon50. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ead5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b1kn","text":"Afterthat, use the spatula to collect a maximum of powder. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f3r64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"27sg4","text":"Recover most of material you can using the spatula.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ugta","text":"Store the Falcon50 tube containing the powder at -80°C until RNA/DNA extraction process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gjtc","text":"Disassemble  the cryogrinding tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e26p7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db91f","text":"Wash thoroughly all the parts of the cryogrinding tubes, and the FreezerMill extractor  using a teethbrush to remove powder residues following this order :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmk7p","text":"- 1% diluted bleach ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i44","text":"- tap water ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq8mq","text":"- milliQ water ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c23q6","text":"- EtOH 70% .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aea0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnjmq","text":"Decontaminate the bench, and Becher using RNase away for next sample cryogrinding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u1nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2tcs","text":"Put all the small equipment cited above (including the teethbrush) on an alumin paper and incubate them into UV-light at least 20min. (in a PCR hood or a cross-linker for instance, https://www.dutscher.com/frontoffice/product?produitId=0O-78-39)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":181,"length":63}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"456620B9543F11EC98090A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.dutscher.com/frontoffice/product?produitId=0O-78-39"}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ali79","text":"To not degrade RNA, all work must be done with liquid nitrogen.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s26f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ro7v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edgfg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c978m","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1dsr6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6rdoa","text":"Respect safety conditions when you work using liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fjd56","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dq870","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dlcur","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"72CCD6804EA511ECB3541DA8A93B6224","id":188251,"original_name":"Liquid Nitrogen.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fz459ufn.pdf"}}}}
